meanings.definition: The quality or state of being uniform.
meanings.sent1: The uniformness of the army's attire made them easily recognizable.
meanings.sent2: The uniformness of the pattern on the fabric was pleasing to the eye.
meanings.sent3: The uniformness of the cupcakes made them look like little soldiers in formation.
meanings.sent4: The uniformness of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The uniformness of the rows of trees created a sense of order in the forest.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is uniform.
meanings.sent1: The uniformness of the color gradient was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The uniformness of the test scores indicated a fair evaluation.
meanings.sent3: The uniformness of the weather made it easy to plan outdoor activities.
meanings.sent4: The uniformness of the waves crashing on the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The uniformness of the sound in the room made it feel peaceful.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of lacking variation or diversity.
meanings.sent1: The uniformness of opinions in the group stifled creativity.
meanings.sent2: The uniformness of the landscape gave a sense of monotony.
meanings.sent3: The uniformness of the jokes at the party became tiresome.
meanings.sent4: The uniformness of the music in the playlist put everyone to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The uniformness of the menu made it hard to choose what to eat.
